root.name: MovieMaker
root.description: This class can be used to create a QuickTime movie from a Processing program while it's running. Different parameters to the constructor allow the movie to be created at different sizes and formats. Everytime the addFrame() function is run, a new frame is added to the movie. The finish() function is necessary to finish and save the movie file.

method.mdescription: Adds a new frame to the video
Finishes and saves the video file
